title: Wing launches awaited Dallas-Ft. Worth drone deliveries April 7
content:
Though it took a bit of preparing to get aloft, Alphabet-owned Wing Aviation is set to launch its drone delivery service in the Dallas-Fort Worth (DFW) area this week, a bit over five months after the company announced the expansion of its activities in the fast-growing region.

moreâ€¦

The post Wing launches awaited Dallas-Ft. Worth drone deliveries April 7 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Alphabet-owned Wing says it will finally launch long-awaited drone deliveries to the Dallas-Fort Worth area on April 7
